During 2019, [[Minecraft]] celebrated its '''tenth anniversary''', releasing a number of content to celebrate.

== Promotions ==
=== Cake ===
On the day of May 17, 2019, as an [[Easter eggs|easter egg]] the cake model on {{JE}} would have an added 10, made of [[Concrete|white concrete]].
<gallery mode="nolines">
10 years cake render.png
</gallery>

=== Merchandise ===
As part of the anniversary, a number of pieces of merchandise were released to celebrate, as well as a sale of existing products "[justifying] 133 exclamation marks."<ref>{{Mcnet|massive-minecraft-sale|Massive Minecraft Sale|May 10, 2019|[[Tom Stone]]}}</ref><ref>{{Mcnet|merch--merch--merch-|MERCH! MERCH! MERCH!|May 20, 2019|[[Tom Stone]]}}</ref>

=== Website ===
{{Empty section}}

== Games ==
=== ''Minecraft Classic'' ===
{{main|Minecraft Classic (JavaScript remake)}}
In order to "embrace the past," a remake of [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.23a 01]] coded in JavaScript was released under the name ''Minecraft Classic''.<ref>{{mcnet|embrace-past-minecraft-classic|Embrace the Past with Minecraft Classic|May 7, 2019|[[Tom Stone]]}}</ref> This version had up to 40 usable blocks and supported nine player multiplayer, though with a number of changes and anachronisms from the original.
<gallery mode="nolines">
Classic-computer-screen.gif
</gallery>

=== ''Minecraft Earth'' ===
{{main|Minecraft Earth}}
Announced early into the year, {{MCE}} is an augmented-reality mobile game where the player would travel across physical spaces and collect items.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-game--minecraft-earth|New Game: Minecraft Earth|May 17, 2019|[[Tom Stone]]}}</ref>

== Downloadable content ==
=== 10 Years of Minecraft ===
{{main|10 Years of Minecraft}}
Released on both the [[Marketplace]] and [[Realms]], 10 Years of Minecraft is an educational exploration map made to celebrate the anniversary. The map is set inside of a compound themed around the game and its history, with numerous books on blocks of the time, themed areas, and references to fanon such as [[Herobrine]].

== Books ==
=== ''Minecraft Annual'' ===
{{main|Minecraft Annual 2020}}
{{Expand section}}
The 2020 edition of the [[Minecraft Annual|''Minecraft Annual'']] book series celebrated the anniversary.
